phases.name: Create Aliases
phases.description: Register flat ID → path aliases for backward compatibility

phases.name: Update Registrations
phases.description: Update actor registrations to use hierarchical paths

phases.name: Update Usages
phases.description: Replace flat ID address() calls with hierarchical paths

risks: ⚠️  26 path proposals have low confidence. Manual review recommended.
⚠️  Large migration (251 usages). Consider incremental approach.
⚠️  41 actor registrations to update. Plan supervision tree carefully.
validationChecks: ✓ All tests pass after alias creation
✓ All tests pass after registration updates
✓ All tests pass after usage updates
✓ No flat ID deprecation warnings in logs
✓ No routing errors in production logs
